[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:17, topic:151696”]Dragonus, are you fucking retarded? Never had he stated that there were to be or ever was a Dragon Plate, Kite Shield, or Full Helmet of any kind. He merely posted pictures he either made or found. Whether he was implying they were real or not is your decision to make. But obivously it isn’t in-Game, other wise it would be much smaller, and not so detailed.[/quote]There is a Dragon Plate. Its actually a toy, called ‘Dragon plate’. item.title: Dragon plate and kite!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:28, topic:151696”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=207487.msg1830769#msg1830769 date=1192779353]
There never has been a Dragon Plate, nor a Dragon Kite Shield, now if there were to be one, or there are plans for one, I wouldn’t know. But I doubt after 4 years without Dragon Plates or Kite Shields, it wouldn’t make sense to introduce them. Though there was the introduction of the Dragon Axe, and Two Handed Sword. I don’t think they would even think of implementing a Dragon Plate and Kite Shield.
[/quote]

Dragon full helm?[/quote]

Hmm? What about it? I don’t think there is a Dragon full Helm, I havent played in many months though. I just thought of something, or rather I finally gave it a second thought. If he had made these, they should be in the Graphics section, but by posting it in here, is implying there is going to be these items some day soon. Either that or the topic poster is fucking retarded.

Read full topic

i’m pretty sure he;s talking about this one, i think you just love to disagree with me legit.
[/quote]

Well notice how those were two separate paragraphs. He could have been stating the kite in the model was based off the 3rd age kite. The antecedent of the following ‘this’ is unclear, so it may very well be referring to the d kite in general, hence the ‘if.’[/quote]
but since it is unclear he could be referring to these models.

item.title: Dragon plate and kite!
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:17, topic:151696”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=207487.msg1828342#msg1828342 date=1192684932]

OMFG just let the thread die he made all of this shit up haven’t you people read the posts above you!?

What ‘shit’ did he make up? This was clearly modeled, it’s not like they’re in-game screenshots of any kind. So what are you talking about?

i’m saying that these aren’t real and ARE jsut modeled, if they were ot come out with d kite and plate it wouldn’t be like this,
[/quote]

Dragonus, are you fucking retarded? Never had he stated that there were to be or ever was a Dragon Plate, Kite Shield, or Full Helmet of any kind. He merely posted pictures he either made or found. Whether he was implying they were real or not is your decision to make. But obivously it isn’t in-Game, other wise it would be much smaller, and not so detailed.[/quote]

i wasn’t talking to the thread maker, i was talking to the idiots that kept posting saying shit

Read full topic
